title: Refund Policy
rules: Customer can request refund within 30 days of purchase. Product must be unused and in original packaging.

title: Late Payment
rules: Grace period of 5 days. Late fee of $5 applied after grace period.

title: Password Reset
rules: User must verify email and answer security questions. Reset link valid for 24 hours.

title: Account Suspension
rules: Account suspended after 3 failed login attempts. Contact support for reactivation.

title: Shipping Policy
rules: Free shipping on orders over $50. Standard delivery 3-5 business days.
